name: Lost Toys
description:
Team: NANIkisunami and  https://jester-great.itch.io/

Made in 48 hours for GGJ 2021 using Core.

The Toy Box has fallen down and all the toys have scattered on the floor! Find your way back to the toy box while racing against other toys!

CONTROLS:
- WASD to move
- Space to jump
- Shift to Sprint
- C to Crouch

Grab a Toy Outfit and run to the finish!
